title: Illinois Freedom of Information Act Request: Body-Worn Camera and Rear Seat Camera Footage – Arrest of Marc Phillips (November 27, 2024 Incident)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act (5 ILCS 140/1 et seq.), I respectfully request copies of all video recordings related to the detention and arrest of Marc Phillips on or about November 27, 2024, near the parking lot and facilities of St. Joseph Medical Center, Joliet, Illinois.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by Joliet Police Department personnel during their response to the person down call, initial contact with Marc Phillips, detention, ambulance transport assistance, and hospital interaction.

Any rear seat (transport vehicle) camera footage capturing Marc Phillips, if he was transported at any point by a Joliet Police Department vehicle.

The footage should include events shortly before, during, and after officers' arrival, ambulance boarding, hospital entry, handcuff removal, and physical altercation inside the hospital. If multiple officers or vehicles were involved, I request footage from each.

I respectfully request that the footage be produced in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, applying only the minimum necessary redactions required under Illinois law to maintain the completeness and factual accuracy of the record.

If any records are withheld or redacted, please provide a written explanation citing the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records electronically if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Illinois Freedom of Information Act Request: Arrest of Henry Lange (December 9, 2024 Incident)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act (5 ILCS 140/1 et seq.), I respectfully request copies of all video recordings related to the investigation, pursuit, detention, and arrest of Henry Lange on or about December 9, 2024, following a stolen vehicle incident in the area of Cass Street, Collins Street, Webster Street, and Scott Street, Joliet, Illinois.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by Joliet Police Department personnel during the pursuit, crash response, detention, arrest, and transportation of Henry Lange.

All vehicle dash camera footage from any patrol vehicles involved in the pursuit, stop attempts, collision response, or arrest.

Any rear seat (transport vehicle) camera footage capturing Henry Lange during his transportation to the hospital and/or the Joliet Police Department.

The footage should include events shortly before, during, and after the vehicle pursuit, crashes, on-foot detention, field investigation, hospital transport, and post-incident transport to the station. If multiple officers or vehicles were involved, I request footage from each.

I respectfully request that the footage be produced in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, applying only the minimum necessary redactions required under Illinois law to maintain the complete and accurate depiction of events.

If any records are withheld or redacted, please provide a written explanation citing the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records electronically if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Illinois Freedom of Information Act Request: Body-Worn Camera, Dash Camera, and Rear Seat Camera Footage – Arrest of Donna Zavala (January 14, 2023 Incident)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act (5 ILCS 140/1 et seq.), I respectfully request copies of all video recordings related to the investigation and arrest of Donna Zavala stemming from the incident that occurred on or about January 14, 2023, near East Washington Street and South Hebbard Street, Joliet, Illinois.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by Joliet Police Department personnel during the initial investigation, crime scene response, and arrest of Donna Zavala.

All vehicle dash camera footage from any patrol vehicles involved in responding to the scene or traveling to Mokena to locate and arrest Donna Zavala.

Any rear seat (transport vehicle) camera footage capturing Donna Zavala during or after her arrest.

The footage should include events shortly before, during, and after the initial scene response, crime scene investigation, suspect identification, arrest at Brookhaven Marketplace in Mokena, and transport back to Joliet if applicable. If multiple officers or vehicles were involved, I request footage from each.

I respectfully request that the footage be produced in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, applying only the minimum necessary redactions required under Illinois law to maintain the complete and accurate depiction of events.

If any records are withheld or redacted, please provide a written explanation citing the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records electronically if possible.

Thank you for your assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

communications.subject: Indiana Access to Public Records Act Request: Incident Involving Dandre M. Hawkins
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Indiana Access to Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request copies of all body-worn camera (BWC) and vehicle dash camera footage related to the arrest of Dandre M. Hawkins on or about February 11, 2025.

Specifically, I am requesting:

All body-worn camera footage recorded by Lafayette Police Department personnel during the traffic stop, detention, and arrest of Dandre M. Hawkins.

All dash camera footage from any patrol vehicles involved in the stop, investigation, or detention.

Please include footage captured shortly before, during, and immediately after the incident. As the arrest occurred at approximately 2:16 PM, I request responsive footage from approximately 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM on February 11, 2025.

I respectfully request that all footage be provided in its original recorded form wherever legally permissible, with only the least restrictive redactions necessary under applicable law, in order to maintain the factual integrity of the record.

If any footage is withheld or redacted, please provide a written explanation identifying the specific statutory exemption relied upon for each redaction or withholding.

I am willing to pay any reasonable fees for duplication and labor. Please provide the requested records in an electronic format if possible.

Thank you for your attention to this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
